title.narrative: OUTPUT 7.8: Communication for Development (C4D)

description.narrative: Output 7.8: By 2026, system and mechanisms to facilitate increased utilization of services, promotion and adoption of specific key childcare practices and positive social norms and engagement of community including adolescents in development and emergency context strengthened., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change (Covid), Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Strengthening Primary Health Care And High-Impact Health Interventions. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Effectiveness: The Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

participating-org.narrative: BANGLADESH BETAR COX S BAZAR BETAR COXS BAZAR
MINISTRY OF WOMEN AND CHILDREN AFFA APC

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
